project.name: Apache Commons CLI
project.description: Apache Commons CLI provides a simple API for presenting, processing and validating a Command Line Interface.

roles.role: contributed ideas and code from werken.opt
contributed ideas and code from Optz
contributed ideas and code from Avalon Excalibur's cli package
helped in the Avalon CLI merge

build.defaultGoal: clean verify apache-rat:check japicmp:cmp checkstyle:check spotbugs:check javadoc:javadoc

site.name: Apache Commons Release Candidate Staging Site
